Hi, I'm Lucas Viola.

I'm a software developer based on Porto Alegre - Brazil. I have worked on many Open Source projects for companies such as Microsoft and ThoughtWorks. Currently I'm working on my own projects. I'm passionate about the Open Source Community, functional languages and Agile Development.
